name: Hyatt Regency Pittsburgh International Airport

reviews.text: I stayed one night here after getting into Pittsburgh late. I called earlier in the evening and booked a room with no trouble.
reviews.title: Hyatt Regency Pittsburgh good stay

likes.liked: — The space of cleanliness of the room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was very nice. It had a good amount of space and the king size bed was very comfortable. The bathroom was also roomy and very clean. Being so close to the airport I thought I would hear more noise, but surprisingly I heard only a few planes.
reviews.title: Great airport hotel

likes.liked: — It was everything we needed it to be
likes.disliked: — If it hadn't been through Hotwire, we'd have paid more - and it's pricey

reviews.text: The staff at the front desk and in the lounge area were very helpful.
reviews.title: Great hotel and location for early/late flights out of the Pittsburgh Airport

reviews.text: We were flying in to Pittsburgh late, and wanted to just stay near the airport before renting a car (avoiding an extra day of rental car, and as it happened, avoiding problems with the rental place closing before the flight came in). This is the ideal hotel for that - it is located in the parking lot for the airport, and is accessible by walkway from the airport. Just walk up to the departures level, and out towards the parking lot.
reviews.title: Perfect place for the night before a flight

reviews.text: We stayed here for my son's 4th birthday. (He wanted to watch the planes take off)
reviews.title: Decent night stay

reviews.text: You definitely can do that and it's entertaining for the kids. We swam in the pool, which was decent, warm, clean etc . . . the only bothersome thing was a young (teenage) couple in the hot tub, WAY too much physical contact, but the 'employee' there didn't seem to concerned. (We left the pool).
reviews.title: Great location, Great service

aka: Hyatt Regency Pittsburgh International Airport Hotel
description: Pittsburgh's newest full service business class hotel, conveniently connected to the Pittsburgh International Airport via enclosed moving walkways. This 11 story boutique-style hotel offers 336 contemporary guestrooms including 22 suites to accommodate anyone's business or personal needs. The Olive Press Restaurant has won critical acclaim for the Chef's crabcakes and our signature 7 layer Chocolate Tower Cake. With 20,000 square feet of versatile meeting space, this hotel can accommodate a meeting for 2 to 1,000 people. This hotel is centrally located to major corporate headquarters, office parks, shopping and only 25 minutes from downtown Pittsburgh.
